name: test262
description: Test262 tests conformance to the continually maintained draft future ECMAScript standard found at http://tc39.github.io/ecma262/ , together with any Stage 3 or later TC39 proposals.

scripts.diff: git diff --diff-filter ACMR --name-only main.. -- test/ && git ls-files --exclude-standard --others -- test/
scripts.test:diff: npm run test:diff:v8 && npm run test:diff:spidermonkey && npm run test:diff:javascriptcore
